bibl.title: Five Copenhagen Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. P. Haun. Inv. 24. Census return. Arsinoe, A.D. 188-189. - 2. Inv. 28. Homologia (the contents are those of a will). Karanis, 24 oct. 121 (edd.: 122/3). - 3. Inv. 317. Private letter. Unknown provenance, late 6th or early 7th century. - 4. Inv. 318. Cheirographon concerning rights of drawing water. Karanis, 15 May 439 (edd.: 439). - 5. Inv. 406. Concerning a public bath. Unknown provenance, 5th or 6th century.
bibl.seg: Bülow-Jacobsen Adam and Sten Ebbesen, Five Copenhagen Papyri.
CIMA No. 6 (Copenhague, 1971) 41 pp. et 6 pll. dépl.

1. P. Haun. Inv. 24. Census return. Arsinoe, A.D. 188-189. - 2. Inv. 28. Homologia (the contents are those of a will). Karanis, 24 oct. 121 (edd.: 122/3). - 3. Inv. 317. Private letter. Unknown provenance, late 6th or early 7th century. - 4. Inv. 318. Cheirographon concerning rights of drawing water. Karanis, 15 May 439 (edd.: 439). - 5. Inv. 406. Concerning a public bath. Unknown provenance, 5th or 6th century.
